channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lamp post not working, 11th November
item.description:
The lamp post on the alley way here is not working and is pitch black at night making it unsafe and dangerous to use the alley way to access or leave RiverPark Gardens.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravensbourne Avenue, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barrier no longer prevents access to park from main road, 11th November
item.description:
The road barrier does not extend enough to prevent vehicles from gaining unauthorised access to the park from the main road. The state of the dirt indicates this path sees regular use. Delivery bikes and mopeds are often seen driving through the local park and endangering pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eastern Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned food waste bin and spillage, 11th November
item.description:
There is an abandoned food waste bin (large) on the pavement which has fallen over and rotting food has spilled onto the street. The stench is awful.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valley Road, Shortlands, London

item.title: Leaves need to swept up, particularly as the colder weather and rain makes it slippery and unsafe to walk on, 11th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 161, Sumner Road, Peckham, London

item.title: Numerous dangerous paving slabs, 11th November
item.description:
Good morning, Iâ€™d like to report numerous dangerous paving slabs outside my property. They are causing people to trip etc, they run all the way outside my property, there area number of elderly that live in the close that this could cause problems to. The affected area is outside 18 Heath Road, Bexley, Da52dp. Thankyou
